entry.title: Generalized covenants with taproot enable riskless or risky lending, prevent credit inflation through fractional reserve
entry.summary: The email conversation discusses the concept of using unspent transaction output (UTXO) with time-based lockup for advertising services. The idea is that the advertiser can "close up shop" by simply spending the advertising UTXO when their service is no longer needed. This allows some time-based hedging for the merchant, while also being different from the proposal made by Tamas. The conversation then goes on to discuss the use of covenants and multisig in this context, as well as the economic issue of creating a cost that is not actually incurred if the lock can be released at any time before maturity of the term.
